Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text on recto (15 ll.), verso blank. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Memorandum of a lease by Aeacus(?) son of Lysimachus to the half-brothers Twot and Tef-Hap, sons of Petetumis. Date year 10 Thoth 29 [of Ptolemy Philometor] = BC. 172 Nov. 2". Nos. 10575-10601 from the Siut Archive.
Curator's comments: Being studied by Bahar Landsberger (Heidelberg) Bibliography Felber, H., Demotische Ackerpachtverträge (ÄA 58). Wiesbaden, 1997, pg. 62, 103, 106, 154.
Bibliographic references: Felber 1997 / Demotische Ackerpachtverträge der Ptolemäerzeit : Untersuchungen zu Aufbau, Entwicklung und inhaltlichen Aspekten einer Gruppe von demotischen Urkunden (p.65)
Thompson 1934 / A family Archive from Siut (p.72, pl.28)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (43342) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/43342)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
Acquisition notes: Purchased from M. Nahman. Cf. the additional sheets at the end of Thompson's MS Catalogue, titled "B.M. Nahman Papyri (1923)".
